Text: A few days after the party preparations beganâ€”
Is this...is this the dress for servers?
Yes! You look lovely.
It suits you too, Gamma.

But it's an unusual design, right? I can tell it's
quite uncommon.

It comes from our lord's Shadow Wisdom. Previously,
when I inquired about a dress that is easy to move
in, our lord told me about it.

It was designed with women in mind. It has a nice
design and supreme functionality.

Yes, it feels easier to move around in than other
dresses. You could even battle in it without any
issues, right?

I-I don't think there will be any fighting... So, you
don't mind if I go ahead with this design?

Not at all. As long as it can be visualized, all we
have to do is recreate it with our slime bodysuits.

Thanks to the slime bodysuits, our outfits don't cost
anything.

As for setting up, cooking, and other preparations,
so far we're within the budget.

What about the time frame? You were planning a new
venue, weren't you?
According to Eta, it seems to be almost finished.
Already?! It hasn't even been two weeks...

Unlike with Mitsugoshi, there's no time to spare,
so Eta's taking it seriously. Do you want to check
her progress later?

As Gamma and Alpha make their way to the party venue,
they spot Zeta and Eta.
Just as I...imagined...

It looks great. We finished it faster than I
thought possible.
A-Amazing...
It looks like it's nearly finished.

Huh? Lady Alpha and Gamma? What are you two
doing here?

I finished up today's mission quickly and was just
meeting with Gamma to discuss our outfits. I didn't
expect you two to make this much progress.
Well...you didn't say go slow...piece of cake...
Outstanding. Did you come up with the design, Zeta?

Yeah. When I was on my missions, I remembered a few
places I thought were nice. I made some tweaks,
but it's not bad, right?
By the way, your dresses sure have a rare design.
It's definitely a fresh take... *gulp*

It seems easy to move around in, practical and
functional... I want one too...

No comment on the design, huh... Despite the praise,
I don't feel overjoyed...

Is it just the two of you? I thought Delta was also
working with you...
Oh yeah...Delta isâ€”
Did I keep you...waiting?

Delta bursts in, carrying a mountain of tables and
other furniture.
Lady Alpha? Gamma? What are you doing here?
We're here to see your progress.
That's a lot to carry at once...
Nah! This is nothing!

It's furniture for Master Shadow, so treat it
carefully.
I-I know that! I'll put them down here.
Thanks... Let's place them evenly apart.

Eta skillfully uses slime to lift and position the
furniture effortlessly.
I guess this is how you worked so quickly.

It seems so. No problems whatsoever with the progress.
If anything, the venue will be completed ahead of
schedule.

Finishing early is good, but I'd rather avoid doing
more work with the dumb dog. Just as I've sent her
miles away to carry stuff...

Can you give her more work, Gamma? Like making her go
on a long journeyâ€”
Fish-brain! I heard that! Graaawooooh!
Can you both refrain from fighting?
I'm done... Good night...
At least go to your own room to sleep, Eta...
Hmm, I guess everything is turning out well...
...Yes. I'm glad we could check in on things.
Do you want to see how the cooking is going?

Hmm, yes, I'd like to check on things. Since it's
those two, though, they should be fine...

Gamma and Alpha decide to head to the kitchen to
check on Beta and Epsilonâ€”
